meanings.definition: Of or relating to the retina.
meanings.sent1: The retinal cells in the eye help us see in dim light.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the retinal images to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The retinal scan revealed a hidden message written in tiny letters.
meanings.sent4: Her retinal memory of the sunset was etched in her mind forever.
meanings.sent5: The retinal nerves transmit visual information to the brain for processing.

meanings.definition: A form of vitamin A that is important for vision.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in retinal can help maintain good eyesight.
meanings.sent2: The optometrist recommended a diet high in retinal for better eye health.
meanings.sent3: The retinal supplement gave him superhero-like vision for a day.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like stars after taking the retinal capsules.
meanings.sent5: The retinal deficiency caused his vision to deteriorate rapidly.
